1.title: Wason Selection Task
1.label: reading_1
1.instruction: Click to link below to play a randomized version of the Wason Selection Task, which tests your understanding of conditionals. You will need to obtain a certain score to pass.

2.title: Logical Statuses of Statements
2.label: reading_3
questions: If Caesar crossed the Rubicon, then someone has.
If anyone has ever crossed the Rubicon, it was Caesar
Even though Caesar crossed the Rubicon, no one has ever crossed the Rubicon.
Wood is a light, durable substance useful for building things.
If wood were a good building material, it would be useful for building things.
I live in a three story building that is two stories tall.
